title: President calls for women participation in business
content:
In a tweet on the social media platform Twitter, he said, “Pakistan ranks very poor on gender parity. All business houses promote male progeny. Where are their wives, daughters & daughter in laws? In their own environment, they can ensure no harassment & good security.”“Bibi Khadija was business women. Why do we continue with a misogynist culture?” he asked.
